mapper.sql: o.id AS "company.id", o.name AS "company.name", o.parent_ids AS "company.parentIds", a.id AS "id", a.down_date AS "downDate", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.issue_org_code AS "issueOrgCode", a.card_no AS "cardNo", a.deal_time AS "dealTime", a.indb_time AS "indbTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.issue_org_code and o.del_flag='0' and o.useable='1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bps_dc_conf( id, down_date, file_name, issue_org_code, card_no, deal_time, indb_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{downDate}, #{fileName}, #{issueOrgCode}, #{cardNo}, #{dealTime}, #{indbTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bps_dc_conf SET down_date = #{downDate}, file_name = #{fileName}, issue_org_code = #{issueOrgCode}, card_no = #{cardNo}, deal_time = #{dealTime}, indb_time = #{indbTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
